# Voxel Playground

Voxel Playground is a physics-based micro-voxel sandbox VR game built for Meta Quest.

## Official site

- Home: https://voxelplayground.com/
- Docs: https://voxelplayground.com/doc/
- Meta Quest store: https://www.meta.com/experiences/voxel-playground/9926748747373800/

## Summary

Voxel Playground focuses on physics-driven destruction and building in a micro-voxel world. Players use it as a VR sandbox for building, driving, fighting, and experimenting. It includes survival gameplay and a sandbox-style mode for freeform chaos and testing.
